website_summaries.verdict: In terms of style and comfort, the OluKai Kahu has gotten top marks from users. The removable insert is a welcomed feature as it allows wearers to use their own orthotics. Its heel panel construction promotes the versatility of look and function, which is another thing that people loved. Overall, it is highly recommended for those in search of laid-back walking shoes.
pros: Tons of owners have raved about how comfortable the OluKai Kahu was from the moment they got them out of the box
This slip-on walking shoe has moderate arch support, which is appreciated by a bunch of reviewers
Many folks have stated that the style of this model allows them to wear or remove it with minimal effort
Consumers who have owned this trainer for several years marvel at its durability
Plenty of buyers find this merchandise appealing and it also pairs well with their existing clothing style
cons: According to a commenter, the back section was too stiff and high that it rubbed their ankle raw
An individual notes that the insole of this walking shoe is too thick, causing the top to feel tight

customer_reviews.title: These do not feel like Olukai shoes
customer_reviews.text: For the last few years, I only buy Olukai shoes because they are the only high quality shoes that fit my large low-arch feet well. Unfortunately Olukai has chosen the path of all other shoe makers and created these narrow high-arch things that do not feel anything like any of the Olukai's I have ever owned. Dear Olukai, If people like your shoes from years past, they will hate these. Maybe you should consider being loyal to your loyal customers?
customer_reviews.author: Ted Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe - runs small and narrow.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these shoes. He is pretty anti having laces, so I brought these because I thought they would be great casual shoes. Unfortunately they were too small and narrow for his feet. I may try a size up, but I don’t think that will help with the width. I think these are great if your foot isn’t very wide - if they are you may have issues.
customer_reviews.author: DeeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: I saw these in Key West at a shoe store. They were $40 more and didn't have this color. They are exceptionally comfortable with great arch support and a wide toe area so your toes are very comfortable. I actually purchased another version of these in leather I liked them so much. I happen to be going on a ncruise and I think they will be great for the cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Big Beach

customer_reviews.title: It bit less comfy than the Nohea
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nohea but and a little ambivalent about these. To begin with they're a little tight on the arch and slightly narrower than the Nohea. The fabric is also a bit different from Nohea. Though it's advertised as cotton it feels rigid and polyester like. Still a great shoe though, just not their best.
customer_reviews.author: MilesAway

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as their other slide on shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty wide feet so i try to buy from a couple of brands that i know fit my width and unfortunately these pretty nice looking shoes are much more narrow than my olukai flip flops and slip ons I've loved for years. All in all seems like another well made product that unfortunately wasn't made for my big feet.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Cool design but already wearing from occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: A little narrower than I expected. But they loosened with wear. The canvas is already wearing at the toe after about a month of occasional use. I like the heel design but not sure they will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: XXLERATE, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Another great shoe from Olukai
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of this brand of shoes and have been completely satisfied with each. This is my first pair of Olukai's made of canvas and I thought they might take a little wearing-in, but they felt perfectly comfortable from the first time I wore them. I really like this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J. Daytona Beach

customer_reviews.title: Unknown width
customer_reviews.text: this model is much narrower than the other 2 different models that I purchased. They don't specify widths, but I am pretty sure that there are different widths because this model is very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: My third pair from this company and these are as great as the first two pairs. I wanted something a little more dressy and these are perfect for the more dressy than tennis shoes but not so formal as other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M Leal

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, but Wide Fit
customer_reviews.text: I would give the product 5 Stars, but I found the medium width to be fairly wide. As a result I was forced to return the Size 10 and order the shoe a half size smaller. The 9.5 fit much better, so beware when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: The Warden

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big with no socks
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. Normally wears a 11.5 in a shoe. But half size smaller did the trick. Probably because he doesn't wear socks with them. Great looking casual shoe! A happy medium between a classic boat shoe and a sneaker. These are his second pair. I'm sure we'll get him a new pair every year
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Olukai’s are the best! I have had several pairs of their shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Olukai’s are the best! I have had several pairs of their shoes in different styles over the years, but these are one of my favorites! I am definitely going to have to get these in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Kelley

customer_reviews.title: No heel cup
customer_reviews.text: Heel slips. Felt like walking in a flip flop. Absolutely ineffective heel cup. Fits true to size, no need to size down.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Olukai Online is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes at a fair price. The best part is that I was able to get exactly what I wanted. The selection at the local stores were minimal and nothing in my size.
customer_reviews.author: SRomero

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits large. Looks great but larger than norm. Exchanging for a size down
customer_reviews.author: FiveMill

customer_reviews.title: Slip on shoes made right!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Comfortable well made shoes no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dustyn Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He got them for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Uleau

customer_reviews.title: Great casual loafer shoe and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Good fint. Comfortable and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Vern Froelich

customer_reviews.title: Good boat shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe, took to a beach vacation. Worked well. The first few times wearing they did rub my ankle, was wearing with no show soaks.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan Tamietti

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, need more width.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are almost the perfect shoe. I have a wide foot and these aren't wide enough. The arch is great. Everything about them are great except the width, but will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hall

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so uncomfortable for that kind of money!! Inconsistent cut around ankle bone. Thing cut into my ankle and blistered my skin badly. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Statile

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Color gets dirty easy, something to consider. Very good quality and durable. Mostly comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these shoes before and my husband liked them so much he wanted another pair.
customer_reviews.author: maurie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Olukai always has a good product. These are no exception.
customer_reviews.author: bellisimo1

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and excellent fit. Very comfortable shoe. I own 6 pairs of Olukai shoes. Perfect shoes for beach living.
customer_reviews.author: BJones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable slip-on for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: This Olukai Kahu is perfect for me. It’s a slip-on that is not too tight on my foot, and it has a low arch which is very comfortable on my flat feet. Looks good with shorts or khaki pants.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Parr

customer_reviews.title: Just not my fit.
customer_reviews.text: It looked good in the box, but they were just not comfortable. Love my mesh Olukai.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They had been worn, the bottoms had marks and the toe was creased.
customer_reviews.author: LC627

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look good
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, provide even better cushioning then I thought. Look like they’re made well and should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Light and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear around. Doesn’t scuff white boat deck.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd pair. Last me about 2 years of everyday use. Very comfortable price is a little high but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the shoe and the service of the company.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe fit is a little narrow in the with.
customer_reviews.author: logan

product_meta.title: OluKai Kahu Slide-on Shoe in Trench Blue
product_meta.description: Premium and easy to wear, the Kahu offers unrivaled comfort with a laidback look that reflects our island mindset.
feature_bullets: Combining classic style with signature detailing, the OluKai® Kahu shoe offers unrivaled comfort for the adventurer seeking a modern update to his everyday outings!
Premium cotton canvas is breathable, natural, and lightweight.
Collapsible-back shoe features a fold-down heel counter that allows it to be worn as a slip-on or a slide.
Removable and washable dual-density anatomical PU footbed with a polyurethane gel insert and a soft microfiber footbed cover.

All-weather, non-marking rubber cupsole. Leather logo patch adorns outsole. Razor-siped outsole for added traction on wet surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 15 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
